data.text: @EU_Commission Say no to #EUecigBAN. We are vapers we are voters. Were not quitters. Expect us. #ecigs out of TPD
@EU_Commission Nutzt die Chance, etwas wirklich Gutes für die Gesundheit der Bürger zu tun und sagt NEIN zum #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Vaping #ecigs is neither a crime, nor a bad thing. Corruption is. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Ich dampfe und ich genieße es in vollen Zügen. Ich lasse mir die #ecigs durch einen #EUecigBAN  nicht nehmen.
@EU_Commission I have a dream: the democracy lets me free to vape & to stop poisoning myself with the tobacco ! #NOecigBAN @Aiduce #EuCigBan
@EU_Commission Vaping is neither a crime, nor a bad thing. Corruption is. #EUecigBAN #ecigs

@EU_Commission tomaremos nota de vuestra decisión.
STOP #EUecigBAN SAVE #ecigs
@EU_commission Cigarette sales have dropped this year by more then 10%, is that why you want to ban #ecigs so fast? STOP the #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission si les #ecigs sont un produit du tabac,je suis un gnous Stop à l'enfumage #EUecigBAN sortez la #ecigs de la directive
@EU_Commission We can quit smoking thanks to #ecigs , what more kan you possibly want! No #EUecigBAN #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission  how much safer can you make a product that even skeptics agree is 99% safer than cigarettes? #euecigban #ecigs"!
@EU_Commission #ecigs haben das Potenzial, Tausende von Rauchertoden zu verhindern. Kein #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Is drinking water a cessation medicine for alcoholics ? #EUecigban
@EU_Commission will be responsible for biggest black market since American Prohibition. STOP the #EUecigBAN! #EU #ecigs
@EU_Commission Prefilled cartidges don`t works well, nobody will use them! Don`t ban refillables! Stop #EUecigBAN safe #ecigs
@EU_Commission Kein #EUecigBAN . Reguliert ihr die #ecigs zu Tode, dann rauchen sich viele Menschen zu Tode
@EU_commission @mediapart J'aime vaper, nous aimons vaper, Aidez-nous ! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission @Europarl_EN We have signed the petition against a ban on e-cigs, please listen to the people and to reason #EUecigBAN  #EU
@EU_Commission Tobacco smoke contains 0.1 to 1.5 mg Nic/Cig. (ISO). So why define standardized #ecigs? No #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission #EUecigBAN is immoral, unjust, unscientific and probably illegal.  Transparent corruption in #EU  #ecigs  #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission #ecigs Are 100 times safer than tobacco. Take e cigs out of the TPD. #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Bruxelles capitale des lobbies du tabac. Halte au scandale ! #EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU @mediapart @Rue89
@EU_Commission Vermitteln bedeutet nicht, nur die Position einer Seite zu vertreten. Stoppt den #EUecigBAN - #NOecigBAN - für #ecigs
@EU_Commission If you really cared about the citizens health you would support #Ecigs and stop the corruption/ lies. #EU4citizens #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission  #Ecigs are, what the tobacco companies have been afraid of all these years’ a tobacco-free alternative #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission why not talking with us the people over #vaping are you in fear of BigTobacco & Big Pharma ? Looks that way #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission the vapers of europe shows u whats the sense of #EU watch what #EU4citizens means #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission my health more important than your wealth,all vape money saved will be allocated to aid LEGAL CHALLENGES to ARTL18.#EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission you choose WEALTH at expense of HEALTH. Remove Artl18  from TPD save millions of lives Court cases are looming ?   #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Vous tracez le chemin de la révolte citoyenne - non a l'europe des lobbies #EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU @mediapart @Rue89
@EU_Commission I and 12 million vapers will use saved vape money, to sue each commission member,ref "Freedom of Speech" BAN. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Are you worried,you ban ecigs,12 million EU citizens will spend their vape money on a team of top lawyers? & WIN!! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission @borgton  Removal of my free speech, NO! I will take you to HR courts & WIN.Stop me vaping NO,I take legal action.#EUecigBAN

@EU_commission  ban the #ecig is like banning the light bulb in favor of the candle #euecigban

No #EUecigBAN
